This FREE Netword App, a patented technology, is a fun way to discover new local businesses in your neighborhood and help you save BIG with great discounts, coupons, or deals to your favorite stores! Quickly improve your search experience! It’s so easy! With your normal search engine result on the left and a dependable, money-saving local business listing resolving on the right! 

Here’s How!

1. Just install & set your zip code.
2. SEARCH on any major search engine: Bing, Google, Yahoo...and so much more!
3. SAVE money instantly on local products and services in your neighborhood!
4. It's that SIMPLE!

If the keyword you've searched is in our database, you will see a relevant result resolve on the right, otherwise you'll just get your results as you normally do. All of our local business partners have gone through a thorough screening process to ensure quality products and services. They provide a guarantee and will honor all Netword affiliated discounts, coupons, or deals. Non-Intrusive. Secure. Always FREE!

Just Remember: NETWORD. SEARCH. SAVE. SIMPLE! Click “+ Free” now! 

Love our app? Write a Review, Recommend, and Share with your friends now! Much appreciated!
